name: Domestic Bliss: buy both episodes
description:
This is a special offer if you buy both episodes.

Both perfect bound book quality editions of each graphic novel can be purchased here: (comic book size: 26cm x 18cm).

There are six episodes in the series and when the final episode is complete; the collection of episodes will be bound as an epic edition.

name: Dawn in Darlesville
description:
This is the front cover illustration used for the first episode of Gwen Turner's graphic novel series: Domestic Bliss.

Available as as a high-resolution reproduction print on Hahnemuhle fine art/photography paper at A3 original size per illustrated page.

Any other illustrations from the series can be printed on further request.

The Author exhibits originals and has chosen to make them available for purchase at a much later date.

name: This Way That Way
description:
This is a key illustration marking the whole series of six episodes of the graphic novel series: Domestic Bliss, by Gwen Turner.

Available as as a high-resolution reproduction print on Hahnemuhle fine art/photography paper at A3 original size per illustrated page.

Any other illustrations from the series can be printed on further request.

The Author exhibits originals and has chosen to make them available for purchase at a much later date.
